projects.name: JAVA Chatting Application
description: Developed a real-time chat application using the JAVA Swing, facilitating seamless communication between users.
Implemented Socket Programming for real-time bidirectional event-based communication for sending and receiving messages between clients and servers, enabling instant messaging and notifications.
Used in Socket Programming to create a server-side socket (ServerSocket) that listens for incoming connections.
Integrated AWT for event handling, creating windows, events, and handling graphics.

projects.name: Air Stay
description: Built a full-stack web application emulating Airbnb’s core functionalities, providing users with booking and listing capabilities using the MERN (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js) Stack.

Designed a responsive and visually appealing user interface using TailwindCSS, ensuring a seamless user experience across devices leading to a 50% increase in online bookings and a 30% boost in client engagement.

Implemented RESTful APIs with Express and Node.js for efficient data handling and server communication utilizing MongoDB for scalable data storage. This resulted in a 15% reduction in processing time and ensured 99.9% accuracy.

projects.name: Gamesworldz (Platform Gaming Website)
description: Created a dynamic gaming portfolio featuring Hangman, Rock Paper Scissors, and Memory Word Game using Angular for interactive interfaces enhancing online visibility by 200%.
Implemented Bootstrap for seamless mobile-first experiences in games like Hangman and Rock Paper Scissors.
Showcased full-stack expertise by integrating Angular and Bootstrap, ensuring cohesive and polished user interfaces across the gaming portfolio.

achievements.description: Secured a score of 500 marks in CoCubes, demonstrating strong aptitude in problem-solving and analytical skills.
Secured 1st position in debate competition in high school.
